metadata.title: CVE-2017-6076 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In versions of wolfSSL before 3.10.2 the function fp_mul_comba makes it easier to extract RSA key information for a malicious user who has access to view cache on a machine.

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.13.0+dfsg-1').
